nodes.text: Gnarltree wattle was a construction material made from the gnarltrees of the planet Dagobah. While in self-imposed exile on Dagobah, Jedi Grand Master Yoda constructed his hut in the planet's swamps out of gnarltree wattle and stones.
Gnarltree wattle first appeared in the 1980 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
